column1: comments
The price point is reasonable enough to keep people coming back.
Aspen made an amazing  jalapeno margarite 10/10
Brandon did a wonderful job, very attentive and kind. He had mentioned the kitchen forgetting the chipotle sauce when he had ordered it.
I think the servers should have a united front with the kitchen.
Just something he improve on but overall he was wonderful.
Shane was very attentive to the overal restaurant, checking in and making rounds with every table.
The entire experience was amazing.  I loved it and will be returning.
The food was top notch.  The only thing I would suggest with the kids menu is to make sure everthing comes out fully cooked and the portions were a bit large for a child.
Wrapping steak knife with the cutlery so servers don't have to keep running back and forth and are availble to tend to other needs of customers.
The restaurant is very unique and is now my favorite here in Canon.
I have not had asparagus or spinach artichoke dip like I had here. Absolutely 10+/10
Codi was Great!
LOVE THE FOOD!!
Great servie - H20 filled !(doesn't happen in this town) Great Food!
Original server made zero contact w/us… 30 mins. Alicia filled in and did Great.
Burnt bacon, burnt toast :(
Coffee didn't come out till after we finished eating & were still charged for it.
I think you've done a great job with the restaurant. I do suggest that when serving pancakes, offer additional syrup. But we really enjoyed our meal. Thank you and good luck in Canon City !
No kids allowed what so ever! Ever!
We will be back
Fatty steak
Make it Fun. Life is Short
Great to have a quality option in our rather meager environment
Too Cold
Spices
Sauces were amazing. Seems the restaurant is movint in the right direction! Good luck.
Roasted Corn: Charred on outside and not cooked through on inside, otherwise very good.
Excellent service, very timely and delicious
The food was delicious! The space feels very large!
